mapper.select: SELECT statis.name, "item_type".name, "manu".name, statis.count, statis.ex_data FROM item_list_statis AS statis, item_type, manufactor AS manu WHERE statis.item_type = #{param1} AND statis.item_type = item_type.id AND statis.manufactor = manu.id AND item_type.in_index = 1 ORDER BY statis.count DESC LIMIT #{param2};
